eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: The event emitted when the uniswap window changes.

eventDecorators.name: SetCollateral
eventDecorators.description: The event emitted when the uniswap window changes.

eventDecorators.name: SetWeth
eventDecorators.description: The event emitted when the uniswap window changes.

functionDecorators.name: create
functionDecorators.description: Convert the msg.value to WETH, approve collateral to use the WETH and create an entry.

parameterDecorators.name: _oracle
parameterDecorators.description: The oracle that provides the rate between `loanManagerToken` and entry `token` If the oracle its the address 0 the entry token it's `loanManagerToken` otherwise the token it's provided by `oracle.token()`.

parameterDecorators.name: _liquidationRatio
parameterDecorators.description: collateral/debt ratio that triggers the execution of the margin call, encoded as Fixed64x32.

parameterDecorators.name: _balanceRatio
parameterDecorators.description: Target collateral/debt ratio expected after a margin call execution, encoded as Fixed64x32.

returnDecorators.name: entryId
returnDecorators.description: The id of the new collateral entry and ERC721 token.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Convert the msg.value to WETH, approve collateral to use the WETH and deposit to an entry.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers the ownership of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw an amount of an entry, withdraw the WETH and transfer the ETH.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of WETH to be withdraw in ETH.

parameterDecorators.name: _oracleData
parameterDecorators.description: Data of oracle to change the currency of debt to Token of debt engine.
